extendedInfo.description: Cibando is a useful restaurant-finder app. With Cibando itâs possible to appreciate the restaurant long before getting there, thanks to beautiful images of dishes, seating areas, kitchen, assembly and chefs.Cibando also offers a rich array of useful info, news, advice, tips and anything necessary to help you in your restaurant choice.How does it work?Just draw a circle on the map to easily and quickly find a restaurant near you. Browse photo galleries, descriptions, useful info, tips and much more.Why should I use Cibando?Cibandoâs reliable services aim to provide users with an unforgettable and unique dining experience. Features allow you to:+ Find: Restaurants, Pizzerias, Trattorias, Osterias, Pubs, Coffee houses, Bars, Delis, Farm holidays, Ethnic cuisine, Happy hour hangouts, and many more dining categories+ Use GPS to find restaurants near you+ Filter by cuisine, price, and neighborhood+ Search and browse alternative optionsWhat can I do after I choose my restaurant?+ Connect directly to the restaurant's website+ Call to make a reservation+ Check out the restaurant's menu in advance+ Build your list of favoritesWhat makes Cibando special?+ Spectacular and tasty graphics+ Mouthwatering photos+ Intuitive and user-friendly functionalityStay updated and follow us!+ FACEBOOK facebook.com/Cibando+ TWITTER twitter.com/Cibando+ YOUTUBE youtube.com/Cibando+ PINTEREST pinterest.com/Cibando+ SITO cibando.com+ BLOG cibando.com/blog

reviews.title: No Restaurants Found?
reviews.comment: I was really looking forward to using this app to discover new restaurants, but unfortunately for me it kept saying no restaurants found.   Neat idea, but the database of known restaurants doesnt seem to be very deep.
reviews.author: Kyle M

reviews.comment: No restaurants around me ever...in Chicago. Great idea but extremely disappointed
reviews.author: Clayton Hess

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: It won\'t find my location. Keeps saying I\'m in texas or colorado when I\'m not. Won\'t let me change location either
reviews.author: A Google User
